data.eml:eml: Two new species of Parosmylus Needham (Neuroptera, Osmylidae) from China, with a key to Chinese species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Yongjie, Liu, Zhiqi (2009): Two new species of Parosmylus Needham (Neuroptera, Osmylidae) from China, with a key to Chinese species. Zootaxa 1985: 57-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185405
